actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 10 (4d4 damage) acid damage.
